name: Spelling Bee (gonzalcu)
description:
***READ BEFORE PLAYING***

PRINT THIS TO USE FOR THE CROWD

https://www.behance.net/gallery/45189213/Spelling-Bee-Keyboard?

The person playing the game can only look at the screen. Place your index finger on the G key on the keyboard.

The crowd has to guide his fingers, using the paper they have, to the correct key only by saying directional words. Ex) Left, down, right, up.
